description: This file is the client entry point for a Remix web application, responsible for hydrating the app on the client side using React's hydration API.

methods.name: startTransition
methods.description: Enables React to handle state updates without blocking the UI, used here to hydrate the React app.

methods.name: hydrateRoot
methods.description: Hydrates a React application on the client side, attaching React to existing server-rendered HTML.
